original_text:
because they rebelled against God’s commands
    and despised the plans of the Most High.
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀을 거역하며 지존자의 뜻을 멸시함이라

sentences.original_text: because they rebelled against God's commands
and despised the plans of the Most High
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가장 높으신 분의 계획을 멸시했기 때문입니다
